ids_service module

Enhanced ML-IDS Service with Telegram alerts and detailed packet display Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) implementation with comprehensive comments

class ids_service.ConfigManager(config_path=None)[source]

Bases: object

Manages application configuration with Telegram support

interface

Network interface for packet capture

Type:

str

filter

Packet filter expression

Type:

str

promiscuous

Promiscuous mode setting

Type:

bool

alert_threshold

ML alert threshold (0.0-1.0)

Type:

float

model_path

Path to ML model file

Type:

str

telegram_enabled

Telegram alerts enabled/disabled

Type:

bool

telegram_token

Telegram bot token

Type:

str

telegram_chat_id

Telegram chat ID for alerts

Type:

str

display_packets

Display packets on console

Type:

bool

display_interval

Display interval in seconds

Type:

int

packet_format

Packet display format (‘simple’ or ‘detailed’)

Type:

str
